skill.name: lead-research-assistant
skill.description: Identifies high-quality leads for your product or service by analyzing your business, searching for target companies, and providing actionable contact strategies. Perfect for sales, business development, and marketing professionals.
skill.summary: Identifies high-quality leads for your product or service by analyzing your business, searching for ...
skill.author: DYAI2025

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and instructions. No executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or external command execution. The skill defines behavioral guidelines for AI-assisted lead research without any technical capabilities that could pose security risks.

content.user_title: Find qualified leads for your product
content.value_statement: Finding qualified leads takes hours of research and guesswork. This skill analyzes your product and target market to identify companies that match your ideal customer profile, then provides prioritized leads with personalized contact strategies.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes your product or codebase to understand value proposition
Identifies target companies matching your ideal customer profile
Scores and prioritizes leads based on fit score and relevance
Provides contact strategies with decision-maker targeting
Enriches data with LinkedIn URLs and conversation starters
Formats results for CRM import and outreach campaigns
limitations: Does not provide real-time company data or verified contact information
Cannot access private databases or subscription-only services
Results are research-based suggestions, not guaranteed conversions
Cannot make outbound calls or send emails on your behalf

use_cases.title: Find early adopters
use_cases.description: Identify companies that would benefit from your new product based on their tech stack, recent hires, and announced initiatives.

use_cases.title: Build prospect lists
use_cases.description: Research target accounts efficiently with prioritized leads, decision-maker roles, and personalized outreach approaches.

use_cases.title: Discover partnership opportunities
use_cases.description: Find complementary companies for strategic partnerships by analyzing their products, market position, and business needs.

prompt_templates.title: Basic lead search
prompt_templates.prompt: I sell [product description]. Find 10 companies in [location/industry] that would be good leads for this.

prompt_templates.title: From codebase
prompt_templates.prompt: Look at what I am building in this repository and identify the top 10 companies in [location/industry] that would benefit from this product.

prompt_templates.title: Detailed ICP
prompt_templates.prompt: My product: [description]. Target: [industry], size: [range], location: [location], pain points: [points], tech stack: [stack]. Find 20 qualified leads with contact strategies.

prompt_templates.title: Niche targeting
prompt_templates.prompt: Find companies using [specific technology] or that recently [specific event like hiring or funding] who would need [your product category].

output_examples.input: I sell project management software for remote teams. Find me 10 tech companies in the Bay Area that recently went remote.
output: Lead 1: TechCorp Inc (9/10) - Distributed team of 200+, using legacy PM tools. Target: VP of Engineering. Strategy: Mention async work challenges.
Lead 2: StartupXYZ (8/10) - 50-person remote-first startup. Target: Head of Product. Strategy: Cite growth scaling pain points.
Lead 3: CloudFirst (7/10) - 500+ company transitioning to remote. Target: Operations Director. Strategy: Reference distributed collaboration needs.

best_practices: Run from your codebase directory for automatic product context analysis
Be specific about your ideal customer profile including industry, size, and pain points
Request follow-up research on promising leads for deeper insights
Save results to CSV format for easy CRM import
anti_patterns: Asking for leads without defining your target market or customer profile
Expecting real-time verified contact information and phone numbers
Using the skill for bulk email campaigns without personalization
Relying solely on generated leads without manual verification

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude and Claude Code. It analyzes your product context and generates lead recommendations based on your criteria.

faq.question: How many leads can I request at once?
faq.answer: You can request any number of leads. For best results, start with 10-20 leads, then request follow-up research on promising candidates.

faq.question: Can I export results to my CRM?
faq.answer: The skill formats results that you can easily copy to CSV or spreadsheet format for import into Salesforce, HubSpot, or other CRM tools.

faq.question: Is my product information kept private?
faq.answer: Yes. All analysis happens within your Claude session. No data is sent to external services or stored beyond the conversation context.

faq.question: Why do results vary between requests?
faq.answer: Lead research is based on general knowledge and patterns. Results depend on how specifically you define your ideal customer profile and target criteria.

faq.question: How is this different from LinkedIn Sales Navigator?
faq.answer: This skill provides strategic lead research and outreach strategies. LinkedIn Sales Navigator offers filters and contact data. Use both together for best results.
